title.narrative: Advocacy and policy engagement for the protection and safety of HRDs

description.narrative: Engagement in advocacy and policy for the safety and security of human rights defenders at nation, regional and international level. DefendDefenders engaged in research on the freedom of movement for HRDs in exile in Uganda was a basis for a series of advocacy engagements with different human rights mechanisms.

participating-org.narrative: East and Horn of Africa Human Rights Defenders Project (DefendDefenders)

activity-date.narrative: Activity was conducted between July 1, 2020 and June 30, 2021. The report was published and launched at claiming spaces event in Uganda in December 2020. The research has been published in the journal of human rights practice.

recipient-country.narrative: Direct advocacy costs were 11% of the annual budget for the period under reporting.
